c57a61c4-8662-4a88-a40c-6090d1cdfc5b.text:
Vision and Purpose: Ittsy’s vision is to help its customers grow their businesses by leveraging its

services. From vision to life,one idea at a time. Our Service Offerings:

Ittsy offers the following services:

1. Data Integration

2. Solution Architecture

3. AI & Gen AI

4. SaaS (Software as a Service)

5. API Integration

Solution Architecture: Build a solution that meets your design requirements, secure and scalable

enough to meet the evolving needs. Saas: Utilize the power of the internet to unleash your software for the whole world to use. Data/API Integration: No matter the source of your data, we can seamlessly integrate it

anywhere. Our Promise: We take great pride in delivering only the highest quality solutions tailored to our

clients requirements

Which solution is right for you? We take your ideas and transform them into pathways that pave the way for the expansion of

your business. Contact an Ittsy professional to go through your requirements and chalk out a

plan.

b7a9ddb6-81b3-418a-a948-9e218ad64138.text:
Details about AI & GEN AI:

AI and Gen AI have paved the way for Artificial Business Intelligence (ABI), driving business

insights and growth. While AI has existed for years, Gen AI has revolutionized the field. We

customized Artificial Business Intelligence and machine learning solutions. Beneficiaries of AI & Gen AI are:

Business Users

Executive Management Team

Business Managers

Data Analysts

Here is how Business Managers can get benefits of AI & Gen AI

Business Users can interact with the data and other contents to conduct quality assurance and

testing and help improve functionality and overall user experience. Ittsy can assist you to make the most out of your business in a cost-effective and most efficient

way through the use of this technology combo. Connect your internal resources regardless of

the resource type and get answers quickly, interactively, and on-demand. We can scan hundreds of thousands of documents within subseconds or mine data from any of

your datastore and respond to your questions about the content without compromising security. Here is how Executive Management Team can benefit from AI/Gen AI

Members of the Executive Teams can get business insights from the palm of their hands

whether they are chairing a meeting in the office or they are traveling for a business trip outside.

bddb2fbc-cecc-438e-8c52-ed02c55a67bb.text:
Here is how Business Managers can benefit from AI/Gen AI

Business Managers can focus on what they do the best: grow business. They don’t need to be

technical. They can simply ask questions in plain English about any of the business domains

they are leading and get answers quickly to move on with their business objectives and

priorities. Here is how Data Analysts cana benefit from AI/Gen AI

Data Analysts can slice and dice the data to identify trends and patterns without writing any

piece of code. Solution Architecture:

In the Solution Architecture space, this is how we will approach our solutioning. Regardless of the type of data (be it structured, semi-structured or unstructured, Big Data or

traditional data) we will Review, Rebuild or build from scratch a solution that meets your design

requirements, secure and scalable enough to meet the evolving needs. We will have meetings

one on one with subject matter experts or group discussions to understand the business goals

and requirements that the technology solution needs to address. Design high-level structure, components, modules, interfaces, and data flows to ensure that the

solution aligns with the organization's goals and technical standards. With your own technology stack or let Ittsys professionals recommend the appropriate

technologies, frameworks and tools that best fit the requirements of the solution. Ittsy professionals will create detailed technical specifications, architecture diagrams, and

documentation that outline the design and implementation details of the solution which will serve

as a guide for developers and other team members. Ittsy will also ensure that the solution meets quality standards, performance requirements, and

compliance regulations. Ittsy will assess and mitigate risks associated with the solution, such as technical challenges,

security vulnerabilities, and scalability issues and proactively identify potential risks and develop

strategies to address them. Engage/Re-engage Ittsy professionals to stay up-to-date on emerging technologies, industry

trends, and best practices to continuously improve the architecture and design of solutions.

fba17f84-a2bc-42f6-ad65-49809a2fa5e9.text:
SaaS:

SaaS or Software as a Service is a cloud-based model that offers access to data and reports

online, with no upfront costs for software, hardware, maintenance, or upgrades. If you are

looking to reduce IT support or quickly deploy applications and scale up or down its resources

so that you can focus more on your core business functions, then Ittsy can help you achieve

that goal. You just describe your problem and critical business objectives, we will lay out the plan and

execute it for you. Worry free support available 24/7 as well. Data Integration Service:

Data integration involves collecting data from multiple sources and loading it into target

systems. A clear definition of target systems is essential for accurate business logic processing. Ittsy has the expertise and experience in any leading data integration platforms but our product

of reliable choice and recommendation would be Talend Data Integration platform. It offers a

robust suite of tools to connect, access, and transform both standard and Big Data in

multi-cloud and on-premises environments. More than 1000 connectors and components allow

integration with virtually any data source. Other major data integration tools we provide solutions

on are Informatica Power Center and IBM Infosphere also known as Datastage. A good integration strategy is to explicitly define your target systems as the business logic

processing may depend on it. API Integration Service:

Ittsy offers API Integration services as APIs are crucial nowadays, acting as middleware to

separate frontend and backend. They enable systems to interact with data. Ittsy can develop

REST or SOAP APIs for integration with your systems which could be either on of these

Salesforce CRM

Microsoft CRM

Workforce ADP

SAP Succcessfactor, Business Warehouse or any ecosystem

f724b702-f86a-4dec-b21d-add55c24bdb6.text:
Oracle ERP

Workday HR System

Any custom software systems you may have

Product Offerings:

We offer custom built AI & GenAI products. Please reach out for more details and pricing. About Ittsy Systems as a Company:

Ittsy Systems is a technology solution provider specializing in customized software design and

development services. Our primary offerings include Data Integration, Solution Architecture, and

AI, with a focus on Generative AI solutions. The team at Ittsy consists of seasoned professionals with over two decades of experience in the

Services Industry, complemented by fresh university graduates who introduce emerging

technologies to create innovative solutions tailored to customer needs. Ittsy Systems is committed to delivering effective and scalable solutions, emphasizing customer

support during and after delivery. We offer both project-based and product-based solutions. Continuously evolving, Ittsy aims to build excellent customer relationships through

communication, collaboration, and innovation, expanding its services to meet diverse client

requirements. Privacy Policy:

This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when

you visit our website. By using our website, you agree to the terms outlined in this policy.

e5055298-e45b-4c4b-8bf4-e4cd7608f6dd.text:
Information We Collect as part of the Privacy policy are:

Personal Information: When you interact with our website, we may collect personal information

such as your name, email address, and contact details. This information is collected with your

consent and used to provide you with the requested services. Usage Data: We may also collect non-personal information about your interactions with our

website, including your IP address, browser type, and device information. This data is used to

analyze website performance and improve user experience. How We Use Your Information that we collect:

We use the information collected to personalize your experience on our website, respond to

inquiries, and provide you with relevant information and updates. Your personal information may

also be used for marketing and promotional purposes, such as sending newsletters or

promotional offers. You have the option to opt out of receiving marketing communications at any

time. Data Security:

We are committed to protecting your personal information and have implemented security

measures to safeguard your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. Third-Party Services:

We may use third-party services and tools on our website that collect data for analytics,

advertising, or social media integration. These third-party services are governed by their own

privacy policies and terms of service.

a046f80e-5974-4949-b6b5-ec9cc0b3b4f8.text:
Your Rights on Privacy Policy:

You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information stored on our website. If you have any questions or requests regarding your data, please contact us at info@ittsy.co

Changes to the Privacy Policy:

We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our data practices or

legal requirements. We recommend reviewing this page periodically for any updates. If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy, please contact us at

info@ittsy.co

Ittsy’s Cookie Policy:

This Cookie Policy explains how our website uses cookies to enhance user experience, analyze

website traffic, and personalize content. By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies

in accordance with this policy. What are Cookies? Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are

widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners. Types of Cookies We Use:

Essential Cookies: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They

enable core functionalities such as page navigation and access to secure areas of the website. Analytical Cookies: These cookies help us analyze website traffic and track user interactions to

improve our website performance and user experience. Advertising Cookies: These cookies are used to deliver personalized advertisements based on

your browsing behavior and interests.

6b01593f-74e3-4711-8c5d-50a3892b4f7d.text:
Managing Cookies:

You can control and manage cookies in your browser settings. Most web browsers allow you to

block or delete cookies, or be notified when a cookie is being placed on your device. Please

note that blocking cookies may affect the functionality of the website. Third-Party Cookies:

We may use third-party services that use cookies to provide analytics, advertising, and social

media features. These third-party cookies are subject to the respective privacy policies of the

service providers. Changes to the Cookie Policy:

We reserve the right to update this Cookie Policy to reflect changes in our cookie practices or

legal requirements. We recommend checking this page periodically for any updates. Contact Us on Cookie Policy:

If you have any questions or concerns about our Cookie Policy, please contact us at

info@ittsy.co

Contact on General Inquiries:

You can contact us at info@ittsy.co or use our contact form below to get in touch with us or any

question you may have about Ittsy. We will respond to your inquiry as soon as possible. Customers we have served or offered our services To:

Ittsy professionals have extensive experience in providing services both in private and public

sectors across North America. Please reach out for more details through the Contact form

available on our website or send us email at info@ittsy.co. Can we provide a List of Customers we have served? Yes, we can provide a list of customers

we have served. Please reach out to enquire further via info@ittsy.co. Ittsy Office Address:
